alert.note: Alert for Central and Southeast Phillips; Central and Southern Valley; Northern Phillips; Northern Valley (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued January 03 at 2:16PM MST until January 06 at 3:00PM MST by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TUESDAY TO 3 PM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 45 below zero. * WHERE...Valley and most of Phillips Counties. * WHEN...From 7 AM Tuesday to 3 PM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Expect slippery road conditions with light snow possible Tuesday. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibilities.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Central and Southeast Phillips; Central and Southern Valley; Northern Phillips; Northern Valley
